+ Wiki Bookmarks

You can add a bookmark to a WikiPage by selecting Wiki "Add Bookmark"
from the [Navigate Menu].  You can also press [Ctrl-Alt-B]. 

To view your bookmarks select "View Bookmarks" from the "Wiki" menu,
or press [Ctrl-Shift-B]. 

Bookmarks are just a form of WikiDocumentAttribute.
